mean_cn: n. 【矿业】【物化】沉降，【化学】沉淀
mean_en: the natural process in which material (such as stones and sand) is carried to the bottom of a body of water and forms a solid layer
sentence: The colorful layers of the canyon are the result of millennia of sedimentation.
sentence_trans: 峡谷多彩的岩层是千年沉积的产物。
word_etyma: sediment沉淀物 ＋ ation名词后缀 → sedimentation沉降，沉淀
